ruleEngine.rules.masterRules

Class CommRules

  • java.lang.Object
    • ruleEngine.rules.newRules.RuleComposite
      • ruleEngine.rules.newRules.RuleCompositeAND
        • ruleEngine.rules.masterRules.CommRules
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRule

    public class CommRules
extends RuleCompositeAND
    Class not testing any rule but compute the communications on the map according to the terrain and unit types. Called by the RuleChecker by the computeCommunications() private method on the demand of the Game object.
